welcome_message_body: Welcome to Puerto Princesa, the charming capital city of Palawan known for its stunning beaches, vibrant wildlife, and underground river. We invite you to explore and immerse yourselves in the beauty of our city and make unforgettable memories. Enjoy your stay!
